src_original: uddiṣṭaṃ nidānaṃ /  uddiṣṭāścatvāraḥ pācattikā dharmāḥ /  uddiṣṭā triṃśannisargikapācattikā dharmāḥ /  uddiṣtāḥ catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmāḥ /  uddiṣtāḥ sātirekapaścāṣaḍ śaikṣā dharmāḥ /  uddiṣtāssaptadhikaraṇaśamathādharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 我已說戒經序、已說八波羅市迦法、二十僧伽伐尸沙法、三十三泥薩祇波逸底迦法、一百八十波逸底迦法、十一波羅底提舍尼法、眾學法、七滅諍法，此是如來、應、正等覺戒經中所說所攝。

src_original: uddiṣtā duve dharmāḥ /  dharmo anudharmaśu /  etakoyaṃ punastasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya dharmavinayo
tgt_original: 若更有餘法之隨法，與此相應者，皆當修學。

src_original: prātimokṣasūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno yo vā anyopi kaściddharmasya anudharmo tatra  samagre hi sarvve hi sahite hi saṃmodamāne hi avivadamāne hi ekoddeśe hi kṣīrodakī  kṛtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāne hi /  sukhañca phāsuñca viharante hi anadhyāvācāya śikṣākaraṇīyā /
tgt_original: 仁等共集，歡喜無諍，一心一說如水乳合，慇懃光顯大師聖教，令安樂住，勿為放逸，應當修學。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.1. kṣāntiḥ paramantapo titikṣā nirvvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 」忍是勤中上，　　能得涅槃處；

src_original: nahi pravrajitaḥ paropaghātī śravaṇo bhoti parānviheṭhayantaḥ /
tgt_original: 出家惱他人，　　不名為沙門。

src_original: idamtasya bhagavato vipaścitasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
tgt_original: 此是毘鉢尸如來、應、正等覺說是戒經。 明眼避險途，　　能至安隱處；

src_original: bhuktismiṃ prāntañca śayanāsanaṃ adhicitte cāyogo etaṃ buddhānuśāsanaṃ //  idaṃ tasya bhagavato śaikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam
tgt_original: 此是尸棄如來、應、正等覺說是戒經。

src_original: idaṃ tasya bhagavate viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //  PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.4. sarvva pāpasyākaraṇaṃ kuśalasyopasaṃpadā /
tgt_original: 飲食知止足，　　受用下臥具； 勤修增上定，　　此是諸佛教。 此是毘舍浮如來、應、正等覺說是戒經。
譬如蜂採花，　　不壞色與香，
